title: Beekeeper Locust

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Spend one bee, converting somebody into a beekeeper locust
-Spend two bees, converting two people into beekeeper locusts
-Spend three bees, converting four people into a beekeeper locust.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You bypass all conversion immunity
-You gain one bee at the start of each night

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert everybody who shall oppose you!

desc:
Post 3259
*The conversion scale has reached bzzz*
